title: Can't reconnect to a game

replies.body: same thing happened to me minus the internet connection loss and the game launching in the first place. got through champion select and the game client never opened.

Is sounds like you're having a connection problem reaching the game servers.  The black screen further affirms this suspicion because it can't download any assets.  Try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
